ValidationRule.description: When the Land Registry Verified is true, please update the Land Registry Type, Land Registry Primary Owner - Salutation, First Name, Last Name.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Land_Registry_Verified__c = True, OR(ISPICKVAL( Land_Registry__c , ''), ISPICKVAL(Land_Registry_Primary_Owner_Salutation__c, '') , ISBLANK( Land_Registry_Primary_Owner_First_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Land_Registry_Primary_Owner_Last_Name__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in Land Registry Type, Land Registry Primary Owner - Salutation, First Name, Last Name
